name: Freedom Flight
description:
Freedom Flight is a game where you play as a bird trapped in the underground. Collect Keys to Unlock Cages and Free other birds, try not to get hit by the obstacles and escape to open skies!

Instructions:

WASD or Directional Keys to move across the screen

Navigate Menus with Mouse

Made for the Torrens University Freedom Jam

Created by

il Gallone (aka Ian Kirk)

ShaydeMakirps 

Whysper
